headline: Kimco Realty® Invites You to Join Its Fourth Quarter Earnings Conference Call
summary: JERICHO, N.Y., Dec. 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Kimco Realty® (NYSE: KIM) will announce its fourth quarter 2025 earnings on February 12, 2026, before market open. You are invited to listen to our quarterly earnings conference call. The webcast information is as follows: When: 8:30 AM ET, February 12, 2026 Live Webcast: 4Q25 Kimco Realty Earnings Conference Call or on Kimco Realty’s website investors.kimcorealty.com Dial #: 1-833-470-1428 (International: 1-929-526-1599). Passcode: 056657 Audio f

headline: How Is Kimco Realty's Stock Performance Compared to Other Real Estate Stocks?
summary: Kimco Realty has lagged behind its industry peers over the past year, yet Wall Street analysts maintain a moderately optimistic outlook on the stock’s prospects.
